meanings.sent1: She always preestablishes the rules before starting a game.
meanings.sent2: The teacher preestablishes the lesson plan for the week on Sundays.
meanings.sent3: The cat preestablishes its nap spot on the sunny windowsill every afternoon.
meanings.sent4: His routine preestablishes a sense of order in his chaotic life.
meanings.sent5: The early morning alarm preestablishes the start of a new day.

meanings.sent1: The event planner preestablishes the seating arrangements before the guests arrive.
meanings.sent2: The team preestablishes their game strategy during practice sessions.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel preestablishes its nut stash in various hiding spots around the garden.
meanings.sent4: The author preestablishes the plot twists early in the novel.
